item.title: [HTB] Machine: Unattended
item.description: Unattended Enumeration nmap └─$ nmap -Pn -p- 10.10.10.126 --min-rate 5000 Starting Nmap 7.94 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-10-27 16:02 BST Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.126 (10.10.10.126) Host is up (0.17s latency). Not shown: 65533 filtered tcp ports (no-response) PORT STATE SERVICE 80/tcp open http 443/tcp open https Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 38.83 seconds └─$ nmap -Pn -p80,443 -sC -sV 10.10.10.126 --min-rate 5000 Starting Nmap 7.
